website_summaries.verdict: A great quality wake-up light with several premium features that help you go to sleep and wake up gently.
pros: Includes 25 brightness settings and sunrise and sunset simulations with red, orange, and yellow lights to help you go to sleep and wake up refreshed
Can be used as a lamp with midnight and reading light settings
2 programmable alarms with 7 nature sounds, FM radio, and white noise
Auxiliary dock allows you to play your own music
cons: You have to scroll through a few menu settings to turn off alarm
Digital clock readout can be hard to read

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE - clock is totally dead after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: If i could give it zero stars i would. The clock was delivered on March 18, 2018 and as of four days ago, it won’t even turn on. Blank. No light- no sounds- nothing, the clock is completely dead. I have tried other outlets and still nothing. $200 dollars totally wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi77

customer_reviews.title: Not really separate weekend / weekday settings
customer_reviews.text: I stepped up to the higher-priced version because of two alarm settings – one for weekday and one for weekend. This is deceiving because there isn’t really a way to set by day of the week. It requires remembering to change the alarm. Disappointing. I will return and buy a less expensive model.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: The app doesn't work and it's UI is atrocious
customer_reviews.text: The device arrived today and there's a 90% chance I'm sending it back tomorrow. The app set-up is not intuitive, it is not easy, and it has failure points where you can't navigate to a resolution. I read other reviews that said the set-up was problematic and I doubted I would have problems. I should have heeded those reviews. At this point, I'm annoyed that I bought a device for its connectivity and it won't connect.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Furr

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: What great product! Wake up to a sunrise and birds chirping in lieu of the death tone. The sunset feature is also a great feature. Not sure if it’s in my head or science, but where I had trouble falling asleep before, now I am out within the 30 minutes of the sunset. Only con is making sure you are setup with the WiFi. I run my phone on 5G typically, but have to switch back to the 2G when I want to make adjustments
customer_reviews.author: ZEN_GAR

customer_reviews.title: ... after reading a Runner’s World article about it - LOVE IT! I struggle to fall asleep at night ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after reading a Runner’s World article about it - LOVE IT! I struggle to fall asleep at night and wake up every morning. I dread the alarm, hit snooze constantly, and always seem to be running late. This alarm is totally customizable and wakes me up when I need to be up, helps me fall asleep at night, and has a unique attractive appearance on my night stand. Best money spent on any sleep-related device!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Cary

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: God-send. It’s been taking us 4hrs+, a resistance blanket and a military bedtime routine to eat our 3 yr old to sleep. This has helped our kid unwind and understand its night time. Some kids need a little more help with that than others, but I found it helped me too, after 2.5yrs of severe sleep deprivation. (Our youngest had medically related sleep issues where they were up every 30-45mins for the first 2yrs+. If you’re relating to that, I cannot recommendation this more.) Sleep well!
customer_reviews.author: Donkey's Breath

customer_reviews.title: cannot program your own alarm-- otherwise awesome wake up plan
customer_reviews.text: i am so into this light -- except, that you cannot program the alarm to play your own music, you can only use the aux to play music thru the speaker-- not to coordinate it with the alarm. relax/wind down sunset mode with ocean sounds ALLLLLMOST makes up for that. Basically I just wish you could customize the alarms just a little more. 4.6 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Surratt

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly effective! XD one question regarding replacement parts
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about the brightness at first, but this light actually worked! It woke me up very very gently, unlike a traditional sound alarm, which got me springing out of bed. I don't think it will work if you tend to sleep with your head covered.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Light not useful if you don't have good curtains
customer_reviews.text: I have blinds that don't completely black out sunlight from coming into the room. While the chirping birds are pleasant, the light won't help you wake up unless you have really good curtains that block out light. I wish I could return it, but I missed the 30d return window.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Ships unsecured in a bag; breaks after a week
customer_reviews.text: Edit: Awful product. The light function completely stopped working after about a week. Now it’s just a regular alarm clock and I’m sending it back. Choose something else. For the price I paid for this thing, I would have expected it to come with printed instructions. Instead it just arrived without documentation bouncing around freely in a taped-shut plastic bag. It looks like it works, but this isn’t the way I’m used to receiving stuff like this.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: stuttering wind-down is a flop
customer_reviews.text: I picked this particular model for the wind-down breathing function. Setting up the make-up alarm was easy, even with setting it to start with no audio. Setting up the wind-down feature was a little fussy and unclear, and the end result was deeply unsatisfying and distracting. The light is supposed to pulse in time with your desired speed, smoothly. Unfortunately the light jerks up and down brightness levels like a flickering nightlight on its last legs. I tried resetting the device and starting new, but it seems to be a regular part of its design. I am returning the alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Killday

customer_reviews.title: Wake up to “sunrise,” fall asleep to “sunset!”
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for my husband. Very easy to use, and he loves it. His old alarm clock was obnoxiously loud, waking up the kids down the hall every morning. This one is a gentle, relaxing wake-up to the warm glow of the “sun” and birds happily chirping. We also love falling asleep to the “sunset”, a 10-minute progressive sleep timer that slowly dims until completely dark and has a sound machine feature. Love this clock!
customer_reviews.author: D. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Needed new alarm
customer_reviews.text: It took a few days to adjust, but I am waking up before any sound and so subtle and effective. I love it now and don't want to go back to a noise waking me up again.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal
customer_reviews.text: Occasionally wakes me without needing a back up audio alarm. The issues with the device are: 1. Trouble connecting to WiFi so I cannot use the app. The device connects intermittently but not constantly. 2. The settings are difficult to figure out. 3. I still can’t figure out the snooze button. The return window has closed so I cannot send it back. But I think for the price this would be more user friendly and less frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Speak Up

customer_reviews.title: Can't connect...?
customer_reviews.text: Funny how I couldn't connect to it, and here I thought I knew something about tech. I wonder what other people would go through.. spent 30 minutes trying to connect. Mentioned there might be an issue with 5GHz network, switched it off and made the BW 2.4Ghz, didn't work. Reset the devices, reset wifi-network on phone and router. Still did not work. It was a good waste of time :).
customer_reviews.author: lonel

customer_reviews.title: Good function bad design
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for about four months now; I bought it as I started a new job that required getting up before the sunrise. As others have stated, the big oversight in the design is the touch screen function and the maze you need to navigate to turn the alarm off. The light alarm functions well and wakes me up refreshed. I just wish more thought was put into the fact people will want to turn off the alarm once it starts going off.
customer_reviews.author: MKim

customer_reviews.title: welcome to 3005
customer_reviews.text: amazing, bottom section is a touch display (not colored obviously) accepts aux input from your phone, which takes a second to figure out how to use, bluetooth would be better, controlling the alarm with an app would be even better. I love being able to tap the top of the unit to turn it off, and then turn on a super dim orange night light back on It's a little tricky to figure out how to use at first, but not too complicated. I do wish I could use aux during relaxbreath though, I wanna listen to my podcasts!!
customer_reviews.author: DevinRhode2

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing.
customer_reviews.text: This wake-up clock is perhaps one of the weirdest things I own. But I have to say it is also one that I cherish. It's simply the best alarm clock ever--it wakes me without making me angry. I don't quite know how to explain what it does, but basically, the light starts getting brighter to wake me up, and then it has nature sounds to make sure I'm up (bird chirping). It's sorta ridiculous someone has not figured out a better alarm clock until the 21st century, but Phillips has done it. I just LOVE this damn thing. It's weird and different, but it works for me. Best alarm clock ever, IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: Eliphas Levi

customer_reviews.title: Run don’t walk!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend as a gift and I really almost kept it for myself. He uses it everyday and says it has really helped his sleep and his mornings. It’s just such a better way to wake up! Especially for winter months, it makes it feel natural to wake up at any time, even if it is super dark outside! I did so much research before choosing this light and there really was just no other product that came close. It’s so worth the little bit higher price point, I can’t recommend enough.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and getting settings right is difficult, but if you manage to it's a decent unit.
customer_reviews.text: I really like all the things you can do with this lamp, but if you try to use it without the app it is very difficult and annoying to set things the way you like them. There seems to be multiple settings for the same thing, and it's just a confusing experience trying get it to do exactly what you want. I have not tried the app yet, but I will update this if it turns out to be the key to getting this properly set up. It could definitely use a more intuitive user interface when using the clock itself to adjust settings.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Works if you set an alarm as a backup.
customer_reviews.text: Works well but I do grow accustomed to it and find myself turning to the right in the morning to put my back to the light lol. Good thing is has an alarm feature. Love the birds and the owls.
customer_reviews.author: T. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: App isn’t Compatible with 5g Network
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product. A bit pricey. I had to return it because the app will not work with a 5g network. You must have a 2.4g network. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Heather E. Walke

customer_reviews.title: Does not connect to Orbi wi-fi
customer_reviews.text: This does not connect to my orbi wi-fi. Orbi runs on 2.4 and 5ghz. This does not connect.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Berova

customer_reviews.title: Ripped off by Amazon. I can’t wait until I can cancel Prime forever.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon sold me a refurbished product as new. It came in the manufacturing box without even a proper box. Way to label that I have something valuable! The inside product has no shrink wrap at all. Tiny scratches. Even a few scuffs. This site has gone completely downhill in the past few years.
customer_reviews.author: Abdullaman

customer_reviews.title: Soothing wake ups
customer_reviews.text: It has taken me a few weeks, but I really enjoy my sleep light. I hate mornings and usually hit snooze for about 45 minutes before I begrudgingly get out of bed, so this light has helped me get up BEFORE the alarm goes off just because the light slowly wakes me up-which is a more soothing way to wake up. Yes, it’s expensive, but wouldn’t you rather start your day off right or would you rather be in a crabby mood because an annoying alarm startled you awake and then tired because you hit snooze for another 45 minutes (not to mention late for work or wherever you have to be in the am...)
customer_reviews.author: LoveJP

customer_reviews.title: Nice wake up feature
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Wake-up Light, especially the Sunrise Alarm, there are two reasons I gave it a 4 star rating: #1) the sleep feature is only available in increments up to 15 minutes, 30 would have been nicer #2) the display is white - I need corrective lenses to see (contacts or glasses) so if I wake in the night, without my glasses on, I can not see/read the display to know what time it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: App Negates the Value of the Device
customer_reviews.text: 1) The product video shows light naturally progressing, this product does not do that. 2) App is broken, you have to register to Philips to get some stability. Even then it still wont keep connection fir more than a few seconds. I have memorized all the steps I have to make to customize the alarms because I had to do it really quick before it disconnects again. 3) App does not value privacy. Why do you need to record my location everytime I use the app? I thought the companion app will make managing this device easier. I was wrong, now I will have to learn to configure the device without the app.
customer_reviews.author: Squishy

customer_reviews.title: I Definitely Do Not Recommend This Device
customer_reviews.text: I am returning this device. It’s a bedside alarm clock with a few relaxation features. It’s promoted as a therapy light but it’s really not. The onboard ambient sounds are harsh and fake-sounding (OMG “Alps...”). It’s not easy to use, even with the app. The iHome Zenergy is a much better alternative for only $75. I should mention that, in my 20 years as an Amazon customer, this is my only return ever. I won’t normally mess with it but, at this price, I’m not keeping an unsightly brick.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberli Baker

customer_reviews.title: Not Sure It's Worth the Price...?
customer_reviews.text: Kind of irritated that there are not more functions on the alarm and sounds for the price that this is sold at. Two alarms, but no way to choose weekday or weekend function. Not many choices of what alarm to wake up to or what sounds to fall asleep to. Light function works as stated, but if I had known better I probably would have gone with the cheaper version.
customer_reviews.author: Nala's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Decent product, but needs improvment
customer_reviews.text: I like a wake up lamp but for as bright as this is, I wish it were brighter. I won't hold it against the product. The reason it didn't get 5 stars is because until a recent software update, I could not get this to connect to its companion app no matter how much I tried. Additionally, the lamp turns itself off after an hour and I would like that time to be user defined. All in all, it's a good product, but I purchased a smaller wake up lamp at a very small fraction of the price of this one and it works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Adam R

customer_reviews.title: Simple biohack to get a better night's sleep
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how you like to wake up, but this sunrise alarm clock really helps sync my body to my own circadian rhythm. I have a sleep schedule that some times doesn't match the sun, but with this alarm clock, my body feels more well rested and in sync with the scheduled needed for my career. Simple biohack to get a better night's sleep One draw back NOT SUPER easy to use, I wish there were tactile buttons to manipulate the settings.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Nunn

customer_reviews.title: Great way to wake up.
customer_reviews.text: I wake up before sunrise and really like how this alarm clock gently wakes me up. It has helped my internal clock adjust to this early rise schedule. Great tool!!
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Very pricey, but great for early risers!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very nifty and great for an early riser like me. I use it on days when I have to wake up before the sun. It actually does gradually lift me out of sleep! I find that I wake up before the sound goes off because the light is gentle enough to coax me awake. Dislikes: The brightness is not enough to replace an actual lamp or bright enough to read by. It pretty much only works for me when I have to wake up before the sun. Otherwise it's just a really expensive clock. Although it's cool, the cost far outweighs the value.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Reinke

customer_reviews.title: Complete rip-off
customer_reviews.text: Worthless overpriced junk. WAAAAY overpriced for what you get. No Bluetooth. No IoT/Alexa/Google. You do get an am/fm radio. You can plug your phone into the AUX *BUT* it won’t communicate with your phone aka you can’t have it play your music to wake you up. There are similar products that do a much better job and for cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: HankVenture

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to keep this but it was simply not doing what it claims to do. I think the clinical test done on this was only with 73 people.. cus I definitely didn’t wake up to the sound or the light..
customer_reviews.author: Mermaid Man

customer_reviews.title: Not light therapy
customer_reviews.text: Used as a bedside lamp during winter so I could wake up easily without loud alarms. After I got it set up then it was easy to set it and forget it. Wish the light were brighter. If I am sleeping on my other side, I miss the light and only notice a shadow on the wall. So it will have to do. It's the best of the group I've tested and sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine K. Howard

customer_reviews.title: helping to regulate my sleep-wake cycle without drugs
customer_reviews.text: Not as hard to set up as I had feared; a quick start guide helped a lot. I do find that the clock loses time somewhat. I've had this about a week, and the clock is now one minute behind. Not insurmountable, but also not really understandable on a device this expensive. However, I do like having more control over when my day starts; I live in a time zone where several months out of the year it doesn't get light until almost 9 a.m., which I find a little depressing.
customer_reviews.author: Just another opinion

customer_reviews.title: Do you really need all this device does???
customer_reviews.text: I bought this device because I hate waking up in the dark in the winter time. This device accomplishes the task of slowly waking you up out of sleep instead of being startled awake by an alarm clock. This device does much more than that and the price reflect its many functions. I find that I personally just use the lamp to wake up and for this simple task there are simply cheaper options out there. I suggest that you think about how you will actually use a lamp light this and not pay for functions you may never use.
customer_reviews.author: CCD

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a couple months of basic use
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to this model after my older Philips light had finally died. This one almost immediately had "touch" problems where the things you'd press wouldn't always respond, or would suddenly lag behind and send you to some wild new place inside the menu that you weren't ever trying to go to. After some basic troubleshooting over the next month, it eventually stopped responding to any sort of touch from the middle the corner on one side, making it effectively useless. To be honest, even if it worked flawlessly, it's not worth $200. It feels like a cheap toy that someone would use as a gimmick inside a massage parlor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the most newfangled and useless product
customer_reviews.text: It was OUTRAGEOUSLY EXPENSIVE , and does nothing useful or necessary, or even pleasurable. The lights are barely visible and the alarm was not reliable. We want to return it, found the box and it is in perfect condition. Please let us return it and let someone else have it, and please work on your product and creating real value, not gimmicks to trick people who are desperately looking for real solutions to sleep and insomnia problems.
customer_reviews.author: Marie T. Citarella

customer_reviews.title: Becomes indispensable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sunrise and sunset functions, easy to use after just a short learning curve on how to use the virtual buttons, smooth and wide range of adjustment from very bright to very dim and from sunrise red to bright, and from sunset bright to red then completely off. Good choices for wake and sleeping sounds, including radio, and speaker is fine for those purposes though it doesn't pretend to be a quality radio. A very welcome addition to the house especially in high latitudes when in the late fall to early spring one wakes in darkness.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Fun product, not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: The overall user experience is pretty archaic for today's world. The light itself works fabulously, though! Overall, I don't think this product is worth the cost though.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Byrne

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I wish there was an option to run it by day. It has made waking up so much better. A little more variation in the sounds would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Leo L Altenberg

customer_reviews.title: A fly in the ointment: Weak PowerBackUp+ function
customer_reviews.text: It does what it advertises and I love it. However, I am disappointed about its backup electricity function. In the ad, it says in the event of a power failure, back up alarm remains active for 8 hours. However, "remains active" is just beeping like a 5 bucks ordinary clock. I would expected it to perform the same way within that 8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent shopper

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: After literally sending back two wake up lights, I got this model and it is perfect! Unlike the other two brands I sent back, this model was super easy to program, the brightness is supet bright, and amazingly the FM radio actually comes in loud and clear. I am glad that I finally replaced my old wake up light which was an eight year old Phillips model with this new model. It is beautiful and woke me up with lovely classical music this morning and a super bright light. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: GaleH

customer_reviews.title: Simply reliable. I love it!
customer_reviews.text: My old lamp from the early 90's died and is no longer made. This is a great replacement. I can even charge my phone. It is so darned practical I take it with me in our of town trips which are often and gruesome with having to get up early every morning. I love the sunrise-sunset and my preferred sound is the birds....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is the best for helping to go to bed and to awake without aggravation on the market. I have used other products, this is the best. A little hard to navigate the buttons initially but works consistently and is quality produced.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Best lamp ever!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is perfect to help fall asleep quickly and wake up easily with the sunrise and sunset features. I love waking up to the sounds of cows mooing in an alpine meadow :) I also enjoy that it has a USB port to charge my phone at night.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina White

customer_reviews.title: The alarm I've always needed!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, yes - it's a lot of money. And if anyone is concerned at all about money, this probably isn't the best investment for them. That being said, this makes waking up so much easier!! I love the way the light gradually increases and the sounds for the alarm are exactly what I want. I do wish it was less expensive, but I don't regret the purchase at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda McClelland

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working before 1 year of use
customer_reviews.text: The power cable or internal component that allows it to charge stopped working after owning it for less than a year. I used it likely no less than 30-35 times. It never left my desk and suddenly stopped working. I rarely regret making a purchase, but this is one I really regret. For the price you pay, it ought to work longer. What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Liles

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought w 2 off brand ones and sent it back immediately before buying this one at a much higher cost. Quality is freaking 20x the off brand I returned. This one is solidly constructed (bought two off brand and one came busted with circuit board not even attached to case) programming is easier, and its brighter. Worth the extra money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Box open and damaged
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy the open box version mine wasnt even tapped shut and had a piece of cardboardcut out of it. It is NOT worth the time, money, and energy to get a working one. Also, if you ever have issues, forget Amazon and go directly to Philps. Mine can't play music over a loud clicking noise due to a electrical short in it. The product itself is great and so is Phillips support. I love the light even though its expensive, and plastic. I cant wait to be able to use all the features, that is when a non broken one arrives.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: My sleep quality has improved!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had an older version and I found this new model. I live it! The app for my phone makes it easy to set. I use the sunset and sunrise and wake up to birds chirping. The quality of my sleep has improved!
customer_reviews.author: Greg and Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing so much
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely scared to spend the money but its so worth it. If i'm ever scared to oversleep an alarm, I'll put the light directly facing me with the volume all the way up, changing it each night. Super stable and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: POS. Don't waste your $$. Instructions are terrible. Was on the phone with customer service just trying to figure out how to change the alarm time setting. Was on hold for 29 minutes. Looks like they closed 10 minutes after I called and just left me hanging. Pathetic customer service. It's really an over priced piece of junk. Don't spend money on that!!!!
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: I love how this gently wakes you by simulating a sunrise
customer_reviews.text: I love how this gently wakes you by simulating a sunrise. I appreciate there are choices on the sound for the alarm to go with the sunrise feature. It's nice not to have a harsh sound startle you awake.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Meranda

customer_reviews.title: Invest in your sleep
customer_reviews.text: Works great and helps me wake up gradually. I especially love the sunset feature—it helps me get to sleep. I’ve been on a mission to improve how well I sleep after months of restless sleep because of COVID stress, and this was worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Robbinski

customer_reviews.title: Great for depression!!
customer_reviews.text: I used to cry everyday and be stressed and angry now I run it while I'm sleeping two different times the last time wakes me up with music it's fantastic I would suggest it to anyone who has depression thank you for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Ross

customer_reviews.title: Will not Connect to Smartphones
customer_reviews.text: Will not connect to smart phone. Called but customer service is useless when you can get them on the phone. Like the alarm itself but paid extra for the smartphone version and it does not work.
customer_reviews.author: William E. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: A good idea, just not quite there yet.
customer_reviews.text: The light is intensely bright, but it doesn’t brighten the whole room like flipping the switch does. So it’s easy to just roll over and not really get the benefit of being woken up gently. I think I need an alarm that can sync with a dimmer switch in my bedroom and brighten everything that way. I’ve been using this alarm for about 8 months though, and it’s better than just being woken by an alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe I didn’t buy this sooner! Instead of getting jolted out of your sleep and instantly getting pissed. This wakes you up softly and naturally. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice to wake up to
customer_reviews.text: This is a great alarm! I like the sunrise option for waking up, and the sounds available, make waking up a more enjoyable experience. I wish there was a way that you could play your own music on it as your alarm sound. I also think it is a little pricey, and not sure if it was really worth it.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: I love lamp
customer_reviews.text: Oh my god I love this alarm clock. Waking up during the winter when you live further north than Toronto feels like waking up in the middle of the night. Having some gentle light makes it so much easier to wake up and actually get up before the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life Changing
customer_reviews.text: I struggled so much with getting to sleep and waking up in a consistent and comfortable manner. This device is an incredibly useful tool in implementing a shift in your sleep situation. You still have to make a directed effort, but this thing makes the process so much more pleasant and effective. Oh, and if you're debating between this one and the next level down like I was, go for this one. I was concerned about the extra cost and the shape being weird. Totally worth the extra cost, and I've come to love the shape.
customer_reviews.author: Vance

customer_reviews.title: I will never use another alarm clock!
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed a significant improving in the quality of my sleep since using this alarm clock to wake up in the morning. I get up at 5:20 am everyday and having that sunlight before I wake up helps me feel much less groggy. The nature sounds are also much less alarming than typical alarm sounds. I don’t use this feature as often, but the wind down programs are great. I really like the breathing exercises for relaxing before bed and find it really effective for destressing.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Grossman

customer_reviews.title: No Date - Can't customize alarm for day of week
customer_reviews.text: I'm baffled that Philips would put out an alarm clock that you can not customize by day of week. Had to return. Otherwise, I very much liked the gentle wakening of the alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs K

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 11 months
customer_reviews.text: I liked this a lot but its been 11 months since i bought it and one day it just stopped lighting up reliably - I would turn on the light and it would flicker off. I'm not sure how to contact philips on the warranty. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: AN

customer_reviews.title: In Love
customer_reviews.text: So easy to set up, love waking up with the light, my wife is not complaining anymore about my old loud alarm noise. It has so many features that I don't really use. It has been working great.
customer_reviews.author: Giancarlo

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Pricey but it works. This gently wakes you up in the morning and I don't feel so groggy in the morning. Had to turn up the volume on the nature sounds (tweeting birds) when I started sleeping through them ( usually after going to bed late with an early wake up). The sunset feature really puts me to sleep at night.
customer_reviews.author: amber b

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good and useful as a room light, reading light, and more
customer_reviews.text: Not gonna lie; waking up has been Drastically, noticeably, easier with this. A bit pricey but if you've got it and value both going to sleep and waking up not just effectively but simply naturally as it were=get it
customer_reviews.author: michael haran

customer_reviews.title: The light feature is awesome IMO.
customer_reviews.text: The light feature is awesome IMO, and gently wakes us up. Can get very bright, we turned down the maximum brightness some. Sound is acceptable for a clock, but don't expect a boombox. Suggest must get the Smartphone enabled version of this, as it made programming so much easier. Numerous programming options.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Alcorn

customer_reviews.title: Love.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Makes it much easier for me to get up in the AM. I used to hit snooze 10 times a day. Not I pretty much get up when the alarm goes off. I'm not less grump...but I'm up.
customer_reviews.author: QueBonita

customer_reviews.title: Annoying crackling noise
customer_reviews.text: I did like this lamp; but I’ve only had it for six months and now an annoying crackling sound constantly emits from it when plugged in. I believe the issue is connected to the radio feature although the sound occurs even when not using the radio. I spent $180 on this, so really unhappy this is the kind of quality that amount gets you now.
customer_reviews.author: CSF

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye Dark Mornings
customer_reviews.text: I placed this light on my eastern wall and it feels like a sunrise every morning! It really has helped we have a more positive attitude in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, yet a refreshing way to wake up.
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but I absolutely love it. I feel more awake when I get up in the morning. Cool design and very easy set up.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lee

customer_reviews.title: Yay! Wake up happy.
customer_reviews.text: I love [this] lamp! I am actually able to wake up pleasantly and not angry as I'd always hoped for. The light is bright enough to wake you but not annoying and blinding. The alarm sounds are soothing but not so much that you don't want to get up to turn them off. I do wish there were even more sound options, but There is a way to get them off your phone so I guess that part is my laziness.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Barron

customer_reviews.title: Very expensive but worth it for heavy sleepers!
customer_reviews.text: Really helps to wake me up. The light is bright!! Wish there were more alarm sounds
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: So much better
customer_reviews.text: This has made a huge difference in the way I am able to get out of bed in the morning. Prior to purchasing this clock, I had alarms on my phone going off every 5 minutes for an hour, accompanied by 2 alarms on my previous alarm clock. There were times were I snoozed nearly all of them! Now, I never sleep through the first alarm on this clock. When I get up, I'm more alert and able to start functioning quickly to start my day. This has been a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great wake-up lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this wake-up lamp. The light and sounds are very pleasant to fall asleep and wake up to. It does help start off the day in a better mood! After reviewing the manual for a few minutes, I find it fairly easy to use, and like that there are 2 alarm settings. Although on the expensive end of the product spectrum, I think it's worth the investment. The clock read out is small and without my glasses is hard to read, but I guess that's part of the ambiance.
customer_reviews.author: Kara E Gilman

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: It has definitely helped me get into a more regular sleep cycle. Unfortunately, I can't seem to mute the audio FX on the alarm. I would rather just have the sun rise without birds chirping. Still a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Michael

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should, badly
customer_reviews.text: This is overpriced for what it is. The speaker quality is so bad that it's unusable. The quality of the light hue is lovely, but the transition isn't as smooth as they make it sound like it is. The interface is of mediocre design. I'm glad I didn't pay extra for the app. This is worth maybe $100. That being said, I'm super happy to have it because it really does help me wake up.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: 2010 technology sold in 2020
customer_reviews.text: WTF... For $200 I expected this to work with the hue app and home kit
customer_reviews.author: NO2

customer_reviews.title: Breathes life into a room
customer_reviews.text: I live onboard a boat in relatively small cabin. This alarm/lamp adds such a great atmosphere to a somewhat bland environment. I leave the lamp and radio on all day. This wakeup alarm is excellent and the sound quality is not too shabby. The lamp and alarm is easy to control by both touch or app. It is a bit pricey, but I feel it will pay off over the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Erhard

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this clock. Perfect to fall in sleep and wake up to.
customer_reviews.author: simi

customer_reviews.title: I still don't wake up
customer_reviews.text: I was out of town before the coronavirus struck so I didn't get to try it before the return window closed or I would send it back. It lights up and makes noises as it promises. But when I wake up, the alarm light indicates that it's been on for an hour! I haven't found a mode to wake deep sleepers like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this lamp. The light quality is soothing, flattering, beautiful. I use it as a reading light, a room light, a low evening light, and an alarm clock (the birdsong makes waking up so much easier!). Intuitive, thoughtful, lovely designed. I chose it above others after careful research, and I'm glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better sleep routine, go to sleep more relaxed, wake-up peacefully
customer_reviews.text: Philips Somneo Sunrise Clock has lived up to all my hopes. It is such a restful way to wake up and the wind down routine at night helps me to turn off the TV or close my book and get to sleep on time. The menu is so much easier to navigate than I expected from the comments others gave.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Birds and sunrise!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new alarm clock. It’s a pleasant way to wake up. I appreciate that I can select language display in Spanish. I like the usb outlet to charge my phone. I’d definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Legz Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Peaceful sunrise!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I get up at 3am; this light allows me to wake up “naturally.” My family did a great deal of camping and early morning garden harvesting so this helps simulate the early morning sunrise for me. I’m definitely not as irritated to wake up.
customer_reviews.author: TAdams

customer_reviews.title: nice toy
customer_reviews.text: everything as described, controls can be much better but i guess it is what it is
customer_reviews.author: marcel de jardin

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: Over priced large piece of plastic. Not really needed. Took up too much room on nightstand for what it is. Google assistant compatibility would have been useful.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery & Carolyn Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: May buy one for myself too!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for someone who uses it both to wake up and to fall sleep...LOVES it so much that I may buy one for myself too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item works as described,make sure to read instructions and practice.
customer_reviews.text: This item was recommended to help regulate sleep cycles. I have had this for a few weeks and it has worked well so far. It takes practice to learn to use properly but it does work as described.
customer_reviews.author: janelle christine walter

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat intuitive to operate but find it to be less enjoyable than my clock radio
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Exe

customer_reviews.title: All is great
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Everything works, the management is intuitive, even for those who do not know the language, there are only 4 of them by the way (English, French, German and Italian).
customer_reviews.author: Margarita

customer_reviews.title: Great love it
customer_reviews.text: A absolutely love it, wakes me up gently and consistently.
customer_reviews.author: Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Works well in the summer?
customer_reviews.text: I am waiting to see if this works for me in the winter. So far this fall it isn't working to wake me up.
customer_reviews.author: The Johnson Project

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Although this product it's a little pricey, it is well worth it. The sounds are good the brightness is great and waking up is a great experience now.
customer_reviews.author: shaun jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Facilitates Sleep!
customer_reviews.text: Very cozy drifting off to the sound of rain, and enjoy gently waking up to a pleasant "sunrise" :)
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: I feel like an adult finally
customer_reviews.text: I have insomnia and medication still rarely works, or causes me to over sleep. This isn't a cure all but I am getting to sleep and waking up the most consistently I ever have. I doubted I would ever use the wind down feature, but I use it nightly. Best alarm for sure.
customer_reviews.author: robert fanning
